definition: abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: They were heading almost due east.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾乎是朝著正東方向進發。

sentences.english: Hanging out of the window he saw the clamant crowd shouting at the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 他將身子伸出窗外，看到吵鬧的人羣朝著市長叫喊。

sentences.english: In both teaching and research, the department takes internationalism as the primary goal.
sentences.chinese: 本系不論教學和研究上，都朝著國際化發展。

sentences.english: Hanging out of the window he see the clamant crowd shout at the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 他將身子伸出窗外，看到吵鬧的人羣朝著市長叫喊。

sentences.english: Now, they're on their way home.
sentences.chinese: 現在，他們朝著回家的路前進。

sentences.english: They ran in the direction of the fire.
sentences.chinese: 他們朝著失火的方向跑去。

sentences.english: The young men float on their backs, their white bellies bulge to the sun.
sentences.chinese: 青年們仰面浮游，他們雪白的肚皮朝著太陽隆起。

definition: to catch and hold on/to continue/to go on to do sth/to follow/to carry on/then/after that/subsequently/to proceed/to ensue/in turn/in one's turn
the rear/far behind the front line
to recoil/to draw back/to fall back/to retreat
from now on/in the future/time to come
